refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the URL as an ASCII string

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public stringUri\WhatWg\Url::toAsciiString
Returns the URL serialized as an ASCII string. If the URL contains non-ASCII characters, they are converted to punycode in the host component, and percent-encoded in other components.
This method is similar to Uri\WhatWg\Url::toUnicodeString, but ensures that the output contains only ASCII characters.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the ASCII serialized URL as a string.
